resources.string:
Our Customer Care Team are on hand to help, you can contact us:

 By email: 

 Our email address is customercare@jdsports.my 

 Ensure you give us your order number for a quicker resolution. 

 By phone: 

 For customer care enquiry, please call: +6015-4877 0606 

 9:00 AM – 1:00 PM, 2:00 PM – 6:00PM (Mondays to Fridays, except Public Holidays). 

 Calls are charged at your standard network rate and may be recorded for training purposes.
